title: FREE FIRE
description: Is gaming your domain? Amateur or professional gaming sees no discrimination, only skills, strategy and rules. So gear up for the battle, prepare and clash in the ultimate showdown.
registration: This event comes under general registration.
The team-head should register for the event, on behalf of the team.
rules: The game must be played only using a mobile phone.
Emulators and rooted devices should not be used.
During an ongoing tournament players are not allowed to change their in-game name.
Clan tags before in-game names are allowed to be changed.
Players should have all the maps downloaded prior to the event.
No refund will be provided if the player is kicked out of the server due to glitches or any other cause.
Players should not have any obscene or offensive in-game names.
Matches will be supervised separately to avoid malpractices.
